payload.description: Create TextBlockEditor component with TipTap WYSIWYG editor. Should support headings (H1-H3), bold, italic, links, bullet/numbered lists. Output as HTML. Include floating toolbar with formatting buttons. TipTap dependencies already installed.
payload.context: Uses @tiptap/react, @tiptap/starter-kit, @tiptap/extension-placeholder, @tiptap/extension-link, @tiptap/extension-text-align. Should match Optio design (optio-purple colors). Replaces MarkdownEditor for WYSIWYG editing.
